title: Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch R2 Picture Drama
synopsis: Though it has been one year since the Black Rebellion failed, the battle lives on, as the Holy Empire of Britannia attempts to expand its power worldwide, and the Black Knights work to regain theirs.
